website_summaries.verdict: Bring this device out for a remodel or an even greater project if you're game for a device that will challenge you.
pros: A laser measuring device that will challenge and please the math whiz in us all and also provide results
Scientific and data-driven, this measurer will deliver numbers
We love that it's programmable and also has a great deal of capacity in terms of scope
cons: While modern in design, it could come with a more current instruction material

customer_reviews.title: the measurements were effectively perfect. The only flaw that I have found is ...
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazingly accurate. Every test measurement I tried was within 1/32 of true. When I say "within," I mean less than 1/32 of an inch just to be clear. In other words, the measurements were effectively perfect. The only flaw that I have found is the display. The fraction is placed right on the edge of the display and it is very small. Any shadow makes reading the output difficult, especially with older eyes that can't focus on small text. If you don't have this or a similar tool tool in your arsenal, get one. It fits easily into a pocket, it's super accurate, and easier to use than a tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyPull

customer_reviews.title: Two problems
customer_reviews.text: 1) Thumb pressure to click the button to display the distance causes the device - when handheld with no other support - to move, thereby corrupting the measurement. Usually I can brace or rest it on some object - even my knee or the ground -. but there have been a few situations (too lengthy to describe) where that was not feasible. An ideal device should have a more sensitive (ie, easy-to-press) button. Otherwise, it's consistent & reliable. 2) The instructions for more advance features are not easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Another fantastic STANLEY product
customer_reviews.text: Anything with the Stanley name is high quality. If it wasn’t good, it wouldn’t have that name printed on it. This laser works perfectly right out of the box when you put the batteries (included) in. Super easy to use, very accurate very easy to see the laser dot.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: ... fat max distance laser for 10 years and have loved it but it was getting worn out and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a different Stanley fat max distance laser for 10 years and have loved it but it was getting worn out and was in need of being replaced. This one worked well for a few weeks but now the battery cover just falls off because it is not tight and the laser is becoming blurry and spreading out instead of staying as a single dot. Is this typical for this product?
customer_reviews.author: christopher f. howard

customer_reviews.title: Great laser distance meter !
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing some brands and models, I choose Stanley STHT77140 distance measurer TLM330. This is a compact unit loaded with good features. It can measure from top or bottom side (user's choice). You can open a folding end piece that gives you exact corner fit. Can calculate area, volume, triangle, indirect measures and some others I haven't used. I have tested it up to 240 feet (80 meters) approx. with success. This is a great measuring device. It is very easy to use. I highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Roger Vargas

customer_reviews.title: A very useful device- but some issues
customer_reviews.text: Basically, it gets the job done. The display could be clearer, and I wish it was backlit so that the device is more useful in dimly lit areas. Another disappointment is the very scant documentation that comes with the device. I had to go online and download the owner's manual. And, even the website listed on the packaging was not correct. I had to resort to emailing technical support for this information.
customer_reviews.author: JCArcht

customer_reviews.title: Great for projects.
customer_reviews.text: Not top on the line, but works great and you can't beat the price. This is a good starter one or if you're only using it once in a while, it'll be perfect. I use mine daily and I haven't had any problems. Only complaint is it sucks batteries like a champ, which using it all day every day will do that to most things. My second complaint is the laser is easy to see if you're in shade or inside, but when the sun is blaring on whatever you're aiming at it makes it impossibl to see. I would defdefinitely buy another one. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Coal Deschain

customer_reviews.title: liked the product then did not use for a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one two months ago, used once, liked the product then did not use for a month and now only Info 401 (hardware, return to distributor). Unfortunately out of return window. I must be one of unlucky purchasers, have not heard this problem on reviews
customer_reviews.author: Sonoma Resident

customer_reviews.title: Better check everything manually so one asks what is the ...
customer_reviews.text: To start with this does not come with instructions. does not work for distances over 50 ft when it should be 100 ft and even then the accuracy is way off. Definitely do not build on the measurements this machine provides. Better check everything manually so one asks what is the purpose of this. I need to measure something around 80 feet but the machine does not work that far so I just threw out the money.
customer_reviews.author: stevobembs

customer_reviews.title: plus-minus
customer_reviews.text: It works, but I have two criticisms: It is very lightweight, making it difficult to hold still when reaching at an odd angle to measure some space. Second the buttons are small. You have to press them just right to get them to 'enter'. Then it's not clear which does what, so I end up just pushing buttons until I either get a plausible reading or get the 'cat toy' beam back to try again. In time I'll either get used to it's deficiencies or I'll buy the Kobalt one.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R. Taipala

customer_reviews.title: We love this device and don't know how we ever lived ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this, which we call "digital Stanley", while we were installing bamboo floors in our household. We love this device and don't know how we ever lived before it! This specific purchase was bought as a Christmas gift for our contractor, who was just as impressed with digital Stanley as we were!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia I.

customer_reviews.title: I Use It To Measure Distance Between Trees
customer_reviews.text: I am deploying security cameras in a forest. This little meter does a good job of telling me where to place the wire rope (17.5 feet up). It also gives me accurate distance between trees. It has a red laser that is not easy to see on a sunny day. It works better at dawn, dusk, or a shaded area. Very simple to use and I didn't even read the directions. Dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Anarchy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laser measurer and it's accurate to t/- 1/32" which ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice laser measurer and it's accurate to t/- 1/32" which most other are to a 1/16". For an engineer the 1/32" is perfect. Also has tons more features that others do not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice toy to have for when needed
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of using the old fashioned tape measure that is only good for 25 ft. This toy did the job well wall to wall for over 100 ft. Will take you a few minutes to figure out the buttons but no science degree needed to become a pro. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: eComm Xpert

customer_reviews.title: Works great kinda fun to use too very handy for real estate
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived with a regular tape measure tool, this is just too much fun works great. We have been looking at houses and realized fast some rooms weren't as listed (no way it was a 19x15 bedroom etc) got this and wow fast and easy we can see who's telling the truth on room dimensions!
customer_reviews.author: Bonsai Keto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laser measure
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laser measure, small and light but highly accurate and easy to use. One small gripe - when operating one-handed, it's sometimes hard to press the on/measure button without sliding the device off target. A bigger on/measure button, and perhaps a more sensitive button, would improve the usability.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than tape.
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to measure rooms without pulling out the tape. The only draw back is the button can be a little hard to press, which makes holding it steady a bit difficult. This only becomes an issue for really far distances.
customer_reviews.author: James Livingston

customer_reviews.title: This unit is perfect for very quickly measuring rooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one project, which disappeared. I then started looking at houses to rent. This unit is perfect for very quickly measuring rooms, much simpler and quicker than a tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: With my woodworking skills, I measure three times and ...
customer_reviews.text: With my woodworking skills, I measure three times and still mess up the cut. Not anymore. Whatever I'm working on, regardless of distance, my measurements are recorded accurately in the blink of an eye. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and very accurate. Highly recommended. Perfect match for 3 ft opening that I also measured by tape. Wish I had purchased this years ago. Say goodbye to your tape measure for room sizing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Largent

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Unit works as it should, although the controls aren't very logical. The instructions that came with it are sketchy at best. Downloading an online user's manual is better (available in the UK version).
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful when remodeling a house, etc
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine. Gives you distance or area or even volume. If you are doing anything to a house, get one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Chernack

customer_reviews.title: Concerns
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are minimal. It's possible in most cases, but not easy, to see the laser in daylight outside. It's probably a very nice tool but the company should have consumers test it and give feedback.
customer_reviews.author: snoshow

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well, but it is a bit unwieldy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well, but it is a bit unwieldy...the location of the control buttons on the side is not the most convenient, would have been easier to operate stably with the switch on the side of the unit. But it does measure very accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P. Branton

customer_reviews.title: Good performance indoors, poor performance outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This does the job - but avoid using outdoors. The laser is pretty weak in direct sunlight and shade. Best used indoors and the functions are somewhat reasonable to follow.
customer_reviews.author: EmMar

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully. Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: The item is exactly what I expected. It works wonderfully. Very accurate. It is exactly what I need as a Radon tester to diagram the room that testing equipment is placed.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: It was very handy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived before scheduled delivery date. It works as advertised. I used it to measure rooms in houses I was looking to purchase. It was very handy and easy to use. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: WPat

customer_reviews.title: My husband's favorite toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's favorite toy, and he likes to show it to his friends. They're impressed. (Yeah, we're simple people.) But it works great and warms my husband's heart.
customer_reviews.author: Linford Family

customer_reviews.title: very useful tool
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. but you have to have a surface-to-surface contact to use it. It should be in every handyman's toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: s. berger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to use. The button is slightly hard to push which causes the laser to move off target sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Works OK.
customer_reviews.text: It works OK. Other units have more features. A laser measure is essential in doing estimates in my work, and this works fine.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful...a bit of a curve to be accurate but is very very accurate and easy to use....best I've owned. Saves a lot of steps and words...

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with Stanley STHT77138
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it five stars if were not for the fact that it makes no sound when it has measured; unlike my previous one. Other than this works very well.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use. Good quality as well.
customer_reviews.text: This Stanley laser measure works very well. The material used is of good quality. I read other reviews that stated that the buttons were hard to push or just plain cheap, but they don't appear to be any different than other products I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: He would recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this all of the time. He says it works really well. He would recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor and have 2 of them. They work great!

customer_reviews.title: instructions aren't great but it's not exactly rocket science to figure out
customer_reviews.text: works well, instructions aren't great but it's not exactly rocket science to figure out. Good purchase for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate - very helpful for those hard to reach beams, rafters, ceilings, and far away things.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Small and economical in the battery and easy to use, easy to setup. measure inch & meter I liked it

customer_reviews.title: you get to hold the smart end of the tape and don't need anyone to ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally, you get to hold the smart end of the tape and don't need anyone to help!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT THAT WORKS GOOD. Worked as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Works well, is accurate and good price. Bought with the DeWalt laser glasses and gave as a gift

customer_reviews.title: awesome tool. Little hard to see the dot in ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome tool. Little hard to see the dot in direct sun light. The red glasses do help to locate the dot. Going to get another one because I loaned it out and can't get it back.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to find out it measures distances in inches which ...
customer_reviews.text: The information given does not state what is measured by this laser. I was disappointed to find out it measures distances in inches which I have to use a calculator to convert it to feet and inch fractions and convert the inch fractions. Example: 200 inches = 16 feet .666666 inch fractions; this converts to 16 feet and 8 inches. I replaced a worn out Disto with the Stanley and when using the Disto it would give you 16 feet 8 inches without any conversions.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: A great laser distance measurer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very useful around the home. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: not sure i would buy this one again
customer_reviews.text: i have used similar products that are easier to use.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: So far this has done everything it has been advertised to do. I have compared it to a regular tape to verify the accuracy and it looks good. This is the second one I tried. The first one did not work and it was replaced by the seller with no hassle what so ever

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gadget for my Dad for Christmas and he still finds uses for it every month on projects around the house and garage. That makes it "Dad Approved" and recommended by this buyer as a great gift.

customer_reviews.text: almost impossible to see in daylight and the glasses don't seem to help. Good idea needs outside refining.

customer_reviews.title: Laser Measuring Device
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back immediately. It probably is a good measuring device, but when I tried to use it, I could not get a measurement. The display would not give me a read out. Thinking it was me, the unit did not come with any operator's instructions, so no way to check myself. It is light and it would have been a good unit, but I'll never know. Amazon refunded my money with absolutely no questions.

product_meta.title: Stanley STHT77140 Laser Distance Measurer TLM330
product_meta.description:
Size:330-Foot RangeStanley STHT77139 Laser Distance Measurer calculates distance, area and volume. This device can measure a distance up to 330-Feet (100m), with accuracy of +/- 1/32-Inch (1mm). The continuous measurement tracking function finds distance from a target quickly and easily. The addition/subtraction feature is a convenient way to calculate in the field using standard measurement units. This unit can also calculate an indirect measurement using Pythagoras; measures distances even when point A and/or point B is not accessible for linear measurement. Stores the last 5 measurements taken for reference. The multifunctional end piece makes true corner-to-corner measurements easy and accurate. In addition, this unit also features an inclination sensor; integrated digital leveling identifies position for accurate measurements. Features a backlit, 2 line display which provides visibility in all working conditions, along with an over-molded housing which makes it water and debris resistant for durability and protection. Uses (2) AAA batteries, included. This is a Class 2 laser product, Power output ≤ 1mW.

AMAZON.COM


The STHT77140 laser distance measurer TLM330 accurately determines distance up to 330 feet and also calculates area and volume (view larger). Stanley’s STHT77140 laser distance measurer TLM330 determines distance up to 330 feet (100 meters) with an accuracy of plus or minus 1/32-inch (1 millimeter). Equipped with a multitude of convenient features that make any tradesman’s life on the job easier, the TLM330 is ideal for electricians, contractors, masons, remodelers, painters, architects, inspectors, and builders to easily and precisely measure distance and calculate area and volume for residential and commercial design and construction projects.

MEASUREMENTS WITHOUT MANUAL MATH
The TLM330 not only measures distance up to 330 feet (100 meters) with an accuracy of plus or minus 1/32-inch (1 millimeter), it also calculates area and volume. The TLM330 also allows for indirect measurements, utilizing Pythagoras to calculate distance when point A or B is inaccessible. An integrated digital leveling sensor identifies angles and positions and also levels surfaces for additional accuracy. Its continuous measurement tracking function locates your target quickly and easily, allowing for one-person use on a busy job site. The addition and subtraction capability allows users to quickly calculate in the field in standard units and in fractional or decimal modes without the need for a separate calculator or manual math. And corner-to-corner and edge-to-edge measurements are made simple with the TLM330’s multifunctional and folding end piece.

A backlit LCD screen with three-line display, coupled with a memory functionality that stores the last 20 measurements taken for reference, improves visibility and efficiency on the job site. Handheld and battery-powered, the TLM330 is easy to transport from one job site to the next—and its over-molded housing and water-resistant casing provide durability in rugged conditions. Whether you’re calculating area for painting and flooring material estimates, taking linear measurements for interior trim work or exterior deck construction, or determining the cubic footage of a space for design purposes, the TLM330 is the ideal laser distance measurer for measurements big and small.

ABOUT STANLEY
For more than 165 years, Stanley has specialized in delivering tools and engineered solutions in the industrial, professional, construction, woodworking, and DIY industries on a global scale. A brand of Stanley Black & Decker, Inc., Stanley prides itself on quality, value, and reliability in its hand tool and tool storage lines.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One Stanley STHT77140 laser distance measurer TLM330, holster with belt loop, quick start manual, CD ROM multilingual manual, and two AAA batteries.

HIGHLIGHTS
 * Laser measurer determines distance up to 330 feet and calculates area and volume
 * Accurate to plus or minus 1/32-inch (1 millimeter)
 * Memory stores last 20 measurements taken for reference
 * Continuous measurement tracking capability easily determines distance from a target quickly
 * Addition/subtraction function eliminates need for a calculator or manual math in the field
 * Indirect measurement capability using Pythagoras to determine distance when points are not accessible for linear measurement
 * Backlit LCD three-line display for visibility in all working conditions
feature_bullets: Calculated distance, area and volume with a range up to 330-feet (100m) and accuracy of +/- 1/32-Inch (1mm)
This is a Class 2 laser product, Power output ≤ 1mW.
Calculated distance, area and volume with a range up to 330-feet (100m) and accuracy of +/- 1/32-Inch (1mm)
Continuous measurement tracking function with addition and subtraction
